articles.title: Stock Market Live Updates: Sensex jumps 350 points, Nifty above 14,750; banks, financials lead - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Stock Market Live Updates: Indian indices were trading higher on Monday boosted by banks and financial stocks. The sentiment was also lifted following cautious gains in Asian peers as data on Chinese retail sales missed expectations though industrial output s…

articles.title: Axa IT ops in Malaysia, HK, Thailand and Philippines impacted by ransomware cyber attack - The Star Online
articles.description: PARIS: French insurer Axa said on Sunday that one of its businesses in Asia was hit by a ransomware attack, adding that it was investigating after some data processed in Thailand was accessed.

articles.title: Asia's Covid-19 success stories - Taiwan and Singapore, are now facing new virus threats - The Star Online
articles.description: Singapore and Taiwan, success stories in containing Covid-19, are both rapidly imposing aggressive restrictions at home - and tightening travel between each other.
